00018 #ifndef COBASE_LOCKABLE_H
00019 #define COBASE_LOCKABLE_H
00020 
00021 #include <co/base/lock.h>
00022 #include <co/base/nonCopyable.h>
00023 
00024 namespace co
00025 {
00026 namespace base
00027 {
00033     template< typename D, class L = Lock > class Lockable : public NonCopyable
00034     {
00035     public:
00037         explicit Lockable() {}
00038 
00040         explicit Lockable( const D& value ) : data( value ) {}
00041 
00043         D* operator->() { return &data; }
00044 
00046         const D* operator->() const { return &data; }
00047 
00049         bool operator == ( const D& rhs ) const { return ( data == rhs ); }
00050 
00052         Lockable& operator = ( const D& rhs ) { data = rhs; return *this; }
00053 
00054         D data;
00055         mutable L lock;
00056     };
00057 
00059     template< class D, class L >
00060     inline std::ostream& operator << ( std::ostream& os,
00061                                        const Lockable<D, L>& l )
00062     {
00063         os << disableFlush << "<" << l.lock.isSet() << " " << l.data << ">"
00064            << enableFlush;
00065         return os;
00066     }
00067 }
00068 }
00069 #endif // COBASE_LOCKABLE_H
